familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Non-member Manager of KFF 29 Second Avenue, LLC from Jun 1, 2014, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received $15,001 - $50,000 in Rent or Royalties income from KFF 29 SECOND AVENUE, LLC (Residential Real Estate in New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because there is no indication his interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: KFF 29 Second Avenue, LLC (Residential Real Estate In New York, NY)
